title: Toasted Garlic Bread And Arugula Salad
summary: Toasted Garlic Bread And Arugula Salad is a vegan side dish. For 95 cents per serving, this recipe covers 4% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. One portion of this dish contains roughly 3g of protein, 14g of fat, and a total of 204 calories. This recipe serves 2. 1 person were impressed by this recipe. Head to the store and pick up roma tomato, salt, regular ciabatta roll, and a few other things to make it today. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes roughly 45 minutes. With a spoonacular score of 36%, this dish is rather bad. Try Toasted Bread with Burratan and Arugula, Arugulan and Pear Salad With Toasted Walnuts, and Arugulan and Pear Salad with Toasted Walnuts for similar recipes.
